content.description: Sit start to the right of Battle Hammer in the center of the face on the backside of the War Club boulder and climb straight up over the small overhang.
content.location: This sit starts in the center of the War Club boulder on the side opposite the main face of the Tomahawk boulder beneath a small overhang. To the immediate right of Battle Hammer.

content.description: Sit start to the right of Battle Hammer and Slingshot on the far right-hand side of the backside of the War Club boulder in a vertical crack. Work straight up and over the small overhang.
content.location: Sit start to the right of Slingshot on the back side of the War Club boulder (behind the main Tomahawk boulder).

content.description: Watch out for the death spear and the less-than-great landing. Stand start with your left hand on a good crimp on the arete and your right hand on a bad crimp. Dyno to the lip, minding the spike in the landing. The sit to this hasn't been done yet and probably will take it up one - two V grades.
content.location: Stand starts on the side of the Tomahawk facing The Monolith.

content.description: Sit start low to the left of Cig-Arete utilizing a crack for your left hand and the arete for your right. Make compression moves to climb into the V1 and top out.
content.location: Sit start for Hatchet, located to the left of Cig-Arete.

content.description: Stand start to the immediate left of Cig-Arete on the backside of the Tomahawk boulder. Go straight up to top out.
content.location: Stand starts to the left of Cig-Arete.

content.description: Sit start on a good flake on the smaller "War Club" boulder directly behind the Tomahawk. From the flake, work up into a massive pocket-feature, get high feet, and grab the top of the feature for an amazing undercling. From there, reach high up to grab the arete and pull over the pocket feature. Top out on good holds.
content.location: Sit starts on the downhill side of the War Club boulder behind the main Tomahawk boulder.

content.description: Sit start for Copper Culture on crimps down and slightly to the left by Cig-Arete. Climb into the good edge used for Copper Culture stand.
content.location: Sit starts down and to the left of the good edge for Copper Culture stand. Climbs into Copper Culture.

content.description: Stand start to the right of Cig-Arete on a good edge. Go up and left to another edge jug and get high feet to work up to the top.
content.location: Stand starts to the right of Cig-Arete on a good edge on the downhill side of the Tomahawk.

content.description: Sit start on the arete facing away from The Monolith with your left hand on an interesting crimp hold and your right hand underneath a small overhang on a good edge. Make a big move up to a crimp to the right of the arete and then bring your left hand up to the arete next to it. Top out on good holds from here.
content.location: Sit starts on the right-hand arete of the Tomahawk facing away from The Monolith.

content.description: Stand start around the left-hand side of the War Club boulder behind the Tomahawk and to the left of Hannah's Arete on the slab. Work up the slab to the top.
content.location: Stand starts on the slab on the War Club boulder behind the Tomahawk. To the left of Hannah's Arete.

content.description: Open project. Sit start down in a small cave to the left of Cig-Arete with your left hand around a corner and your right hand on a sloping edge. Make a hard move to the lip and hold it. Match on the lip and slap up to better holds higher up. Top out on V-easy movement.
content.location: Open project. Sit start down in a small cave to the left of Cig-Arete on the side of the Pinky Finger facing away from The Monolith.

content.description: Sit start on the left-hand side of the small overhang on the backside of the War Club boulder (opposite of Tomahawk). Climb straight up.
content.location: This sit starts on the left-hand side of the War Club boulder on the side opposite the main face of the Tomahawk boulder.

content.description: A small boulder in the woods below the powerline in the cluster next to The Monolith.
